sentences.english: Their meaning, that can be looked up in the dictionary, is denotative.
sentences.chinese: 他們的意義是外延的，是可以在字典中查到的。

sentences.english: There are both denotative and connotative defects in the concept of "contradictions between ourselves and the enemy".
sentences.chinese: “敵我矛盾”的概念在內涵和外延上都存在嚴重缺陷。

sentences.english: Denotative meaning is the basic meaning of the word.
sentences.chinese: 外延意義是詞的基本意義。

sentences.english: The interval between the interferentialpeaks is also inversely proportional tO the epitaxy layer thickness.
sentences.chinese: 外延層的干涉小峯間距反比於外延層的厚度。

sentences.english: The interval between the interferentialpeaks is also inversely proportional tO the epitaxy layer thickness.
sentences.chinese: 外延層的干涉小峯間距反比於外延層的厚度。

sentences.english: Second Confucian scholarship on the connotation and extension of thinking to explain.
sentences.chinese: 其次對孔子治學思想的內涵及外延進行闡釋。

sentences.english: In this paper, an experimental apparatus for the low pressure epitaxy of silane is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了硅烷低壓外延的實驗裝置。
“外延”與“內含”往往是密不可分的。

sentences.english: There should be reasonable limitation for the connotation and extension of social law.
sentences.chinese: 社會法的內涵和外延應當有一個合理的限度。

sentences.english: A general mechanism of crystallographic axis orientation transition of REBCO LPE film is suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了較爲完整的REBCO液相外延取向轉變機制。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the enterprise expands only by the same scale.
sentences.chinese: 否則，企業只能以同樣的規模進行外延性擴展。

sentences.english: Epitaxial process and factors affecting property of the material were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了外延工藝和影響材料性質的因素。

sentences.english: Silicon epitaxial planar transistor, for use in audio and general purpose.
sentences.chinese: 硅外延平面晶體管，用於音頻和通用。

sentences.english: The samples were grown on sapphire substrate by plasma-assisted molecular beam epitaxy.
sentences.chinese: 樣品利用分子束外延技術在藍寶石襯底上生長。

sentences.english: The fictitious concept has not only definite intension, but also some denotations.
sentences.chinese: 虛構概念不僅有明確的內涵，而且有一定的外延。

sentences.english: How to understand the difference between meaning, concept, connotation and denotation?
sentences.chinese: 如何理解意義，概念，內涵，外延等相互間的區別？

definition: depth/(of a speech etc) profundity/advanced stage of development
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
depth (from front to rear)/depth (into a territory)/span (of time)/(fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to limit/to confine/to restrict sth within set boundaries
